website_summaries.verdict: The oil-free formula and sun protection make this BB cream a quality everyday go-to.
pros: Lightweight, oil-free cream smooths over pores and fine lines without settling into them
Available in 5 different shades from light to deep
Water and gel-based formula leaves a natural looking dewy finish
cons: Dewy finish isn't ideal for those with oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great bb cream, very lightweight, blends in with my skin perfectly, it does not make it look orange or too pale. It doesn't clog my pores and I love it specially during the winter when my skin gets reddish this cream gives my skin a normal look, absolutely love it for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Fabricia Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap. Moisture and SPF.
customer_reviews.text: Love the moisture and SPF sun protection factor of the bb cream. I wish Maybelline had more colors for darker skin women. I got the medium deep. Great for lazy women who don’t want to “beat the face” and spend time on makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ... use a face cream under it and it works great. Good coverage for women in there 40s and ...
customer_reviews.text: No break outs with this - it's dryer than cover girl's but I use a face cream under it and it works great. Good coverage for women in there 40s and 50s etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dhop

customer_reviews.title: light weight and good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Maybelline's BB cream in the shade light/medium and it works great. It is very lightweight so it doesn't feel like you're wearing sunscreen and it has a pretty good amount of coverage. It did a great job of covering redness on my cheeks and a couple of fading acne scars. Overall I think it would be a good substitute for foundation if you're going for a sheer " no makeup" look.
customer_reviews.author: sxndra

customer_reviews.title: it does a great job at blurring out some of the blemishes and ...
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream isn't moisturizing for me so it only works well if my skin is properly hydrated and moisturized. On some days, though, it does a great job at blurring out some of the blemishes and pores. It does a great job for the price so can't complain much since it's so inexpensive. With that being said, I gave it 3 stars since it's loaded with silicones and uses titanium dioxide as it's main active sunscreen. Zinc has a broader spectrum for UVA/B protection. It also has the tendency to pill.
customer_reviews.author: EHunter

customer_reviews.title: use in place of foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Use it as my base makeup after I apply sunscreen. Then I apply my concealer and other makeup. It's really a light foundation. I dislike heavy foundations. I like it because it contains SPF which is key as I get older. I'm 50 years old and have more fine than ever, and I really like this product because it provides the right amount of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: JG Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning. The color is fantastic and blends in well! I usually put a small dab of my normal moisturize with this product to make it spread easier. I do this especially in the winter when I get pale to help dilute a little of the color. That being said though, ladies(and gents?) don't forget to use sunblock in addition to this product. You won't wear enough of this BB Cream to actually protect your skin from damage :-/.
customer_reviews.author: Marge B.

customer_reviews.title: MAYBE ITS MAYBELLINE
customer_reviews.text: I repurchased this item 3xs! It is so radiant and hydrating on the skin. I use purito spf before applying this for extra coverage. I have no issues with transferring or disappearing throughout the day. I’ve worn this for summer and winter months. This is one of my faves!! I am shade medium/deep 130 (with new packaging); old packaging is shade 530 medium/deep
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Useless - coverage same as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT do anything different than a moisturizer, no blemish coverage, no even toning skin, is oily for my normal skin. I have used bb.creams from other brands for the last 5-6 years in place of foundation , this is the worst. I’m loving one from Covergirl clean matte now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ashy for my Golden Brown Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product gives intense flashback and dries down to an ashy color after a few minutes. It also feels a bit powder and looks cakey. Doesnt feel the best on my skin. It looked like a match for my skintone but this definitely wouldnt work except for in photos MAYBE (no flash photography of course). It was so ashy, I cant even use it as an under eye concealer. It had a weird grayish undertone especially when used over my dark circles as well as around my jawline and hairline, making it look like i had put on a mask. I do not recommend this product for golden undertones or medium brown skin.
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: Natural and Creamy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. If you're not used to wearing a foundation, this is perfect. It's light, feels like a moisturizer when you put it on, and doesn't have a heavy presence. My color is usually a Honey Beige on any makeup I wear so I got the medium. You can barely tell it's there. It doesn't do much for dark circles around your eyes so you can use a concealer. When you wash your face, you can tell you're washing off moisturizer. If you normally wear makeup and are tired of that caked-on look then you should try this.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A.

customer_reviews.title: Open product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bb cream and usually go and get it at the store regularly. I saw it on Amazon for half the price and thought great I'll order it have it shipped to me no problem. Nope. What I got was an open and looks like used bottle. I will not be ordering again. The 3 star rating is because I really like the bb cream but don't order on here unless you want to risk getting an open bottle like me
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: Product pictured is not what I received
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The product pictured is not the product I received. I only ordered this product through Amazon because I thought it was the original Maybelline BB Cream that I love (first picture, product on the left). What I received was the "new + better" product with pomegranate extract (first picture, product on the right) that I am able to purchase at my local drugstore and that I do not like as well. There is a slight variation in the color since the pomegranate extract has been added. (2nd picture, original product on the left, newer one on the right). I know it's subtle, but I can still tell a difference. The newer product also makes my face more oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drugstore product for a light makeup look
customer_reviews.text: This is an old favorite I have come back to. I have worn Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer, It Cosmetics tinted moisturizer, and Bare Minerals powder foundation. This does not offer as much coverage as those products, but is close to Laura Mercier and great if you like a really light makeup look at drugstore prices. The coverage is buildable and very moisturizing and the sunscreen seems to do its job. I usually wear a layer of this with a light dusting of powder foundation that seems to cover even acne well. If you want something inexpensive that leaves you feeling you are wearing no makeup, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Laney Yankovich

customer_reviews.title: I’m kind of torn with this product...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know whether to give it two or three stars. I meannnn... it’s good for REALLY light coverage, but if you’re really fair, it’s way too dark. It kind of blends into the skin after rubbing in for awhile. It has a strong sunscreen smell, and it will leave you feeling kind of oily. I have normal to dry skin, but this leaves too much of an oily feeling behind. It’s great if you just want something to kind of hide very light spots on your skin, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is freaking magical!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin, white with freckles, and I alternately freckle and burn--never tan. Most sunscreens clog my pores and irritate my skin. This BB cream is awesome! It... -blends much more smoothly than all the foundations I've tried ($10-$40) -does a LOT to smooth out my skin tone and make the freckles a bit less noticeable -offers great sun protection; usually by May I've added a bunch more freckles and been burned at least once. This year I've been out in the sun more than usual, but haven't burned my face once and haven't noticed any more freckles appearing. -is easy to apply; perfect consistency And it's way cheaper than anything else even close to comparable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful the colors you order and remember You have to reapply several times in a day
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn’t like anything about the product if you sweat a little bit it comes off after a while it fades like within two Hours and the color is not true to what it looks like when I tried it on it was two lights and it didn’t fully cover actually anything so disappointed I will never order this again The only reason why I gave it one star is because you have to they will not submit it unless you give it a star which it doesn’t deserve.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look like I have flawless dewy younger skin
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and creamy, gives good coverage without feeling heavy. I usually just wear to this for everyday, with a little eye makeup, lipgloss. Makes me look like I have dewy nice completion. For meetings, or special events I may use it under foundation for more coverage. I used to wear a bb / cc cream, foundation, and powder. But as I get older, less is best. Foundation and powder emphasize my fine lines. This bb cream doesn't. Just makes me look like I have great flawless skin.
customer_reviews.author: NYGM66

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation replacement for the minimalist
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I've been using this product for the last year and a half. I'm not a huge fan of full face makeup because I don't like having too much on my face but I do prefer a slightly better version of my skin without looking different, and this is it! This is great for someone who likes a minimal look. I use this bb cream, Burt's bees aglow stick, and a good mascara and I'm ready for the day. I apply it with a beauty blender if I'm going somewhere but day to day use I just use my hands.
customer_reviews.author: meemeiu

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Even the lightest shade is a little too dark for me. I've included a picture of what it looks like beside my current bb cream. Luckily, I bought this with a gift card someone gave me, so I didn't waste any money. It looks a bit better blended onto my face, but it's still off... Gives my skin a slight orange tint. It feels lightweight though and isn't oily at all.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Could this be fake?
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this when I placed a big order, and did not open it up right away, because I found the tube I misplaced. When I did open this up, a bit after the 30 day return period, it was separated when I squirted it out of the tube. It looked super watery and gross. I shook it up real good and decided to try it. It seems thicker than before, but maybe they changed the formula? Second time I put it on, it slightly burns on my face for like 5 minutes...
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this product. It goes on thinly and smoothly. I got the BB fresh 110 which is for light medium sheer tint, and that is great for my complexion in the winter. I am 67 years old and I’m tired of putting on thicker make up all the time which seems to accentuate all of my wrinkles and lines. This product does not do that. I am going to try the same color in a CC cream to see which one I like better. Although this one is pretty near perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Even If Prone to Acne
customer_reviews.text: This is sheer, lightweight, goes on quickly and easily but then isn't greasy at all. It has lightweight coverage. I put concealer on where needed, then the BB. It's very good, no annoying smell, and doesn't cause breakouts on my very, very oily and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An all time fave!!
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin, hate foundation because it feels cakey and feels like my skin is heavy and can’t breathe. I have tried different bb or cc creams from many brands and this is still by far my favorite!! Light and gives your skin a healthy natural glow. Super easy to blend with concealer too! Can’t beat this price either!
customer_reviews.author: Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Not to be a pale princess or anything, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 100 Light and it was a bit too dark and orange tinted for me (I supposedly have a neutral skin tone.) I'm not even close to resembling a bleached sheet of paper (although I may be deluded about my skin color since I keep buying the wrong shade), but if you are you might wanna skip this one. On the other hand, if you don't look like a vampire who crawled out of h#'ll then this will probably match you.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure there was a difference
customer_reviews.text: Overall I didn’t notice much difference wearing this vs not. I applied it to one side of my face, and not the other, and I couldn’t see much difference. I know this isn’t suppose to be full coverage but it seems like a waste if there’s no difference. I have normal/oily skin and this also seems like a oily product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chlewicki

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid BB cream user. I don't like a heavy, full face for work. So I do a BB base. I've found that the blue one (for acne) is mattifying and awesome for summers when you may be a little oily. However, in the winter my skin gets so dry that one was making it worse. Insert Dream Fresh!!!! It's a more luminous version with pomegranate extract. I find that it doesn't cake up during the day and it's kept my skin smoother longer. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boodaroo_23

customer_reviews.title: So light with amazing coverage!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many brand-name products on my face before and I have very sensitive skin. This is by far one of the best BB creams/foundations I have ever used on my face. I could not believe where has this been all my life as it is very cheap and at the same time the coverage and consistency of this product is amazing. This is highly recommended for every day use since it is light but also covers all the blemishes on the skin. It gives your skin an amazing glow Without the extra do we lock. I have sensitive skin with combination of oily and dry skin. This lasts all day on my skin without getting the cakey look.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hamadi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this instead of foundation because I don't like feeling cakey but still want coverage. 1. I have SUPER sensitive skin, I'm allergic to most makeup. This tinted moisturizer didn't irritate my face at all 2. There is light coverage, just enough to smooth out blemishes without giving foundation feel. I enjoy some freckles and natural blushing from my cheeks 3. I have felt moisturized all day and it didn't feel oily or sticky after 15 hours of wear 10/10 would recommend and I look forward to using it a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: GileSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Light with good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. After searching for a new BB cream and reading the reviews of different products I decided to try this one. The bottle is a small size and it's 1oz. When I applied the cream it didn't feel cakey or heavy, it went on smoothly and provided great coverage to those imperfections. This is not make-up so not a foundation it's a cream you use before you apply any other daily make-up that you might wear. For what it's meant to do I love it and will be purchasing this brand again. The other BB cream I used before was way more expensive and felt a bit heavier when applied. I'd recommend to anyone needing light coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad1988

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried a BB cream when they first came out & this is the only one I've tried since then. I generally use an SPF 50 sunscreen with a moisturizer, so a BB cream isn't going to give the same coverage. I purchased this to even out my tone a bit & it works for that purpose. It goes on smoothly, lasts all day, & the shade matches perfectly. I have a problem getting the shade right with a lot of tinted moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Chilly

customer_reviews.title: best cheap foundation
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a dupe for Nars tinted moisturizer which is what i used to use but it very expensive. i love this foundation!! i only wear foundation because i have naturally reddish skin and i like it to look even and pretty without covering my freckles or looking like too much. it’s very sheer and looks extremely natural and beautiful. my skin looks and feels amazing and i get no break outs. it looks like i am not even wearing makeup. i use a damp beauty blender (i spray it with rose water but you can just use plain water) and dab it on my face. i think it makes it come out really beautiful, sheer, and natural.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Apperson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not excellent
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good size, however, I do not see any significant difference in using or not using the product. I always have the habit of using BB CREAM because I think my skin is good and without blemishes, but with this one I didn't see any big difference :( The product is good if you want light makeup to give your face a little color.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Best BB cream on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is my third tube and still loving it. Just enough coverage to make skin look refreshed and hides the redness. Foundations and CC creams are too heavy for summer weather and at this age (60+). Also like in the winter when I don't need as much color and coverage. Moisturizing but not greasy. Easy to take off with a good cleanser or cleansing wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Homeychick

customer_reviews.title: Subtlety flawless, dewy, fresh
customer_reviews.text: This. Stuff. Is. Amazing. Great coverage for a BB cream. Kind of buildable. Stays on forever. Doesn't look cakey or makeup-y. Just very natural and dewy. I do use a loose powder to set it but the BB cream just gives such a flawless, fresh look by itself. After my first couple uses, I ordered more lol. I never want to be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Momma

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: To start off, I have fair/light skin with neutral undertones. A lot of times products that come in limited shade ranges tend to look orange on me. With that being said, this product did not match my skin tone. It came off very orange and just not a great match. However, what was more alarming was that the product was somewhat ‘chunky’? There was little white pieces in it, almost like little exfoliating beads? I thought maybe the bottle I was using was expired so I tried the other one and the same thing happened. I don’t know if this is a common problem but it was definitely sketchy to me and I wouldn’t recommend it for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee Lubben

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: really love this BB cream . I, sometimes switch to others brands but I always come back to it. It is moisturizing, do not irritate my skin, love the color. I would like it better if it gives more coverage but for a BB cream I think it covers really well. I use it everyday , it gives a natural no make up look. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking afterglow!
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream is very moisturizing and natural! For people like me who don't usually apply heavy makeup, this is a perfect skin corrector. I have tried other more expensive BB creams but they tend to be very drying and crack around the nooks of my face. You don't even need a primer, just moisturize your face a bit and it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Accentuates the pores :(
customer_reviews.text: You can see the pores of the skin after applying it, it accentuates the pores; a good BB cream should leave the skin more uniform without accentuating the imperfections and pores like a thick full coverage foundation. Bare Minerals complexion rescue is a better solution for me. I tried. Two stars because it's not good but it's not terrible either.
customer_reviews.author: gym fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream was a perfect match for my fair skin. I was a little worried it would be too dark, but it blends perfectly. It's nice and moisturizing without being greasy. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, and I love that it has SPF . It provides just enough coverage without looking fake. It was also super affordable. I also love Maybelline's Age Rewind Foundation, but I think I like this better because it's lighter. Great product. I'll definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie - MI

customer_reviews.title: more medium than light; you can blend it with regular sunscreen to lighten
customer_reviews.text: If you are fair-skinned, this shade is more of a medium than fair/light. A tiny bit of it goes a long way. As others have stated, such a small amount will not provide adequate sun/broad spectrum protection. Best to use regular, non-tinted sunscreen on entire face, and blend a tiny amount of this in with it. Without applying regular sunscreen, you would need to use a lot of this product on your face for sun protection, and that would result in too heavy/mask-like coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene A.

customer_reviews.title: Very natural
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is veryyyyyy light coverage. I mean... I knew it would be because its a bb cream, but we are talkin verryyy natural. I think I like it haha but its kinda hard to tell. I do think it evens my skin out nicely, so ill give it that. My skin is already pretty even on its own though, so I wouldn't recommend this to someone with more troublesome skin. That being said, it feels very moisturizing and it doesn't have any smell that's too strong like some makeup does. Definitely makes my skin looks dewy if that's what you're going for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Aveeno was perfect and I switched to Oil of Olay CC, caused they discontinued it. It was good but made my face way to shiny...even in winter. I remembered trying a sample of more expensive brands from Birchbox, but not worth the hefty procetag. I have pretty normal skin...dryer in winter, less dry in summer. Only get pimples occasionally. After looking around ALOT, I went with much cheaper, Maybelline Brand. Its PERFECT. Great price, coverage, not only or thick.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I love BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love BB cream. I like to mix it with my moisturizer in the morning, to help give it a nice tint before applying make-up. Its light on the skin and works for each season. I was able to easily match my skin color for the different season, as I am normally very tan in the summer and lighter tones in the winter. It's great to wear by itself too. If I'm not in the mood to put on a lot of makeup, I just apply this with a little mascara for a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive dry skin and this product works great for me. I needed something lighter than a foundation for days when I’m not going anywhere special and I decided to grab this because it was so cheap. It works better than I expected. I have some light acne scars on my face and it covers them for the most part. It leaves my skin looking smooth and even toned without looking too perfect. You can’t even tell I’m wearing makeup. I use a brush to apply and then I blend out with a wet makeup sponge.
customer_reviews.author: angeledelacruz

customer_reviews.title: This works for me and isn't expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and have used it for quite some time. I actually mix this shade with their next darker shade (#120) to get to the shade that works for me. Using a small concealer brush I apply it to my nose & chin areas that need more attention and use my fingers for the rest of my face and "pounce" it on all over with a slightly damp foundation sponge, let it set a bit and then add powder blush (and pouncing the blush with the sponge) and then mineral powder all over to finish up. I get compliments on my complexion from ladies of all ages which makes this 58 year old gal a happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Right for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a good tinted moisturizer. Before I was using senegences color correcting tinted moisturizer which I loved but I didn’t love the price. I’m a minimalist when it ones to makeup because I don’t have a lot of time so this is good to throw on for work when you’re not feeling it. I have red splotchy skin, acne and acne scars. Oh and freckles but I don’t mind my freckles. It took away some redness. If you want a light natural coverage this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisha joice

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a primer
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling to find a good day moisturizer that is super protective against the sun. They usually end up irritating my skin, especially around my eyes. I wear this in the place of a primer on top of my moisturizer. It gives me some extra SPF protection, decently primes, and the teeny bit of tint is nice. That allows me to pick a less SPF focused moisturizer that is a bit cheaper and is gentler on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: UsernameIrrelevant

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i have the most sensitive skin of anyone i know, and i am able to wear this product without breaking out!! this is perfect for days when i don't want to wear makeup, but don't want my red undertone to show. has a nice glossy, moisturizing finish which i love! i even put it on, following a light amount of powder and blush for a nice natural makeup look
customer_reviews.author: Ionna

customer_reviews.title: Does not have much color payoff
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed if it provides good sun protection because I don't get sunburnt super easily, it is pretty moisturizing, and I didn't notice it breaking me out (which a lot of other sunscreens and skin care products seem to do). I have very sensitive skin and end up with hyperpigmentation and red marks from acne very easily, but I didn't notice much of a difference in my skin when applying this. I have used other BB creams so if you are looking for color payoff either use a different product or mix foundation into this product?
customer_reviews.author: Glad14tor

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice BB Cream
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really notice any of the moisturizing benefits, but I do appreciate that it’s one of the only spfs I’ve used that doesn’t leave my skin feeling sticky or like there’s a film over my face. It also blurs my acne scars and hides my redness really well. It’s definitely helped me cut down on my overall makeup use. I just touch up the areas that need a little more help with concealer and then I’m good to go!
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: 15 year user
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a very long long time already. What i love about it is it doesn't clog the pores. that is my no. one requirement. I am a loyal user and really stick to a brand that works for me. It is very lightweight and very easy to apply. I don't really know if it works in the sun, but 30spf should offer a little help. This is actually a tinted moisturizer but i use it as my daily make up wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: Super Light Coverage, Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, super sheer tinted moisturizer. It provides very lite coverage but works well with a concealer for a natural look. Great for very dry skin. Has good ingredients but relatively low SPF. I wear it over a sunscreen. I’ve retired dozens of tinted moisturizer and this is one of the few I’ve re-purchased. I prefer it to much more expensive formulas. Shade range is small but you can buy 2 and blend at this price.
customer_reviews.author: calicycler

customer_reviews.title: Blends Well & Very Drying
customer_reviews.text: If you are someone with oily skin who could use a BB cream, this is it. The medium shade blends so well for medium-light skin tones. It really minimized uneven redness and applied smooth. That said, it does not last for all day wear and it's very very drying. For someone with dry skin, this is not suitable at all. I gave it to my mom who has combination skin and just needs a light tint rather than a full foundation.
customer_reviews.author: MahNazTop Contributor: Cake Decorating

customer_reviews.title: Love this, not fake!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this product it hidrates my skin however there is barely any coverage for blemishes so use a concealer. It is the real thing, I don’t n ow why some people think it’s fake. I compared it to the one at the store that I was running out of and it’s identical packaging and consistency of the product itself. Anyways I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Vicioso

customer_reviews.title: Great price with subscription and love the product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. Love it! It's really light.. not guky. Matches my tone very well. I like that it has sunscreen and Doesn't irritate my skin like some sun screens do. I get this on monthly subscription so I get it pretty cheap! It is light coverage. Covers my pores and you can't really tell I'm wearing anything. Love it
customer_reviews.author: MrsP

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before going into the hospital for surgery. I knew I would not have time to put on makeup or moisturizer. After surgery when I knew I am okay I put on BB. What an awesome moisturizer for what I needed it for. I got compliments like you have a glow and you look beautiful. All that from this tube of moisturizer. I was amazed. Yes, I bought another tube when I got home.
customer_reviews.author: mms.crazy

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin, and my face can either get too greasy or dried out very easily by other products. I love this BB cream because it feels very light, while still giving good coverage. It also moisturizes my face without making it oily. It makes my skin look great, without looking or feeling like I have a ton of makeup caked on. It also does a great job of protecting my very fair skin from the sun so I don't have to use greasy sunscreen on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Miller

customer_reviews.title: All time favourite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite BB cream! I tend to use this instead of foundation everyday because I find it to be quicker and better for my face. My face feels moisturized after putting this on and I feel like I can wear it for about 5 hours until it wears out a bit. I think one of the coolest things is this: When applying, the cream is slightly darker than my skin tone, but as you blend it in the tone directly matches mine! Creates a very even look and doesn't look unnatural on my very pale skin.
customer_reviews.author: A McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Not great as a moisturizer on its own...but I like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product a lot. But it’s not very moisturizing. It’s so dry here in Phoenix I was hoping for something I could just wear on it’s own, but I think I’ll mix it with a light moisturizer to see if it helps. It’s not really drying...just my skin feels a little too dry. Also, I’m usually a medium-light, but medium works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carli W

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The Medium tint looks like it should be too dark for my light complexion, but when I smooth it on it looks very natural and it covers my blotches. The sunscreen works well - no burning even while biking. I do get a little acne if I wear it every day, but that happens with every sunscreen I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ookoo

customer_reviews.title: Perks up my old tired face
customer_reviews.text: The best! I have lost track of how many high end and drugstore B.B. creams I have tried. The is my favorite of all. It perks up my older tired looking skin like no other B.B. cream can do. It has a brightening radiant effect and covers well. I use it on clean dry skin without other products like moisturizers. I hope it is never discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: DeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice light tinted formula
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tinted formula that doesn't leave your skin dewy or greasy. My skin breaks out easily and I have had no problems using this. Gives just a bit of coverage, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the "no make up" look.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of redness on my face but I'm not into wearing full coverage anymore. (I used to out concealer over my whole face..) I wanted something lightweight that could cover redness but wouldn't cover my freckles. This is perfect! It gives me a bit of color so I don't look anemic and it covers the red and unevenness of my face without looking cakey or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Rexroat

customer_reviews.title: Bb cream
customer_reviews.text: This bb cream is light weighted. But it doesn't have a good cover. I bought the light shade which matches my skin tone pretty well. However it doesn't provide enough sun protection if you are in southern California. Overall money worth it and it provides good moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good go-to bb cream slightly toxic
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage and natural looking. Oily afterwards so i have to put a bit of powder. Super affordable here! Only problem is some of the ingredients are toxic. Should include concentrations of certain ingredients
customer_reviews.author: mw785

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Laura Mercier
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with this. I have used Laura Mercier's tinted moisturizer which is like $50 and this is exactly the same. Totally worth it for the money. Works even better if used with a foam beauty blender.
customer_reviews.author: Deeda

customer_reviews.title: One Ounce is Small
customer_reviews.text: Good overall product The tint is just "enough" Also no overpowering fragrance, which is nice But--pay attention--one ounce - not a ginormous tube-for sure
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year now and I highly recommend it. Foundations have always ended up drying out my face during the day. This hasn't caused me any of the issues I used to have. I love how you can't tell I'm wearing makeup when I use this. Again, you could always pick out the foundation on my face before. Give this a try if you haven't yet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I wish bb creams provided more coverage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bb cream for the first time to try it out for a change because I normally don't wear foundation. I found out that the shade medium matched my skin just right and it felt like I wasn't wearing make up at all. I like this product, but it's definitely not for a person who has dark spits or blemishes. The spots will just show through, but that's to be expected of a bb cream I guess, it's not meant to give your skin full coverage. It's a really good product, might try it out again after my skin clears up.
customer_reviews.author: Yishya Byard

customer_reviews.title: ALLERGIC REACTION
customer_reviews.text: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN. I have general allergies and sensitive skin but have never had a reaction to makeup. I used this product twice. The first time was only for a few hours but I noticed my face felt warm. The next day I had small bumps all over my face, but I was testing other makeup so I wasn’t sure this was the cause. The second time I used it alone and had it on all day. By night, I was getting itchy red bumps on my face like bug bites. The next day my face was extremely dry, itchy, and covered in a rash. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: nicolew4

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It is very low coverage, but it’s enough to blur out unevenness and even cover small pimples. It doesn’t help with oily ness, but it does stay on my face for a good 6 or 7 hours. There is no heavy feeling either, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lolobagogo

customer_reviews.title: Good light coverage BB for people with dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: First, I like this product. It is lightweight, my face is not shiny and I feel confident in its SPF 30 ability. I have very dry sensitive skin and a regular foundation was too intense for my face to handle. I use this product alone or with other makeup items. I have not had an acne breakouts with this product. CONS: I with this product has a little more pigment. I normally have to put on a regular concealer with this product for a more finished and glowy look. It takes about 5 mins to dry. Your face will look oily for around that time and you need to have patience for it to set into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Im so happy I tried this product out! Im pretty picky & have been disappointed a lot with other similar products. Im a natural gal these days but i wanted some very light coverage with spf and this was perfect! It makes my skin look moisturized without looking oily or greasy and gives me just enough coverage. Its also Buildable to medium coverage. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: BIANCA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight foundation!!
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream is awesome! I don’t like to wear a lot of makeup but needed something to to cover my huge pores and correct the redness all over my face. This is exactly what I needed. It perfectly blurs my pores batter than my $40 primer can, and corrects redness easily. I bought the medium shade and was worried it would be too dark but it blends perfectly. Buy this now!
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear makeup everyday but when I do I want something light and natural but gives coverage... this is just that... it has a airy light refreshing feel on my face... a little bit goes along way....it does require a sponge to apply...you hardly notice that you have makeup on...it blends nicely to your original skin tone... I will be buying this again... you will love it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany W.

customer_reviews.title: to go bb creme
customer_reviews.text: I mix it with my moisturizer and apply it, I've always been doing that to dilute the bb cream contents of it, however this bb cream isn't that thick so it could go without the moisturizer. When applied, it does make my skin look a bit uniform without and brighter and doesnt make me feel that I have anything on my skin like foundations do.
customer_reviews.author: shakyas

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheer coverage, great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I have reddish skin with some sun damage and unevenness. This product evens my skin out pretty well, and seems to have a brightening effect. A friend with more olive undertones recommended it, and I was skeptical since our complexions are different, but it works for me too, so I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Evenness
customer_reviews.text: Feels very light, is really sheer, provides a tiny bit of evenness to my skin color. Could use for an everyday wear, but I prefer slightly more coverage due to sun damage discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAngel

customer_reviews.title: New formula ?
customer_reviews.text: I like how light this product is. I also like how this is a one step plan. I am not big into spending a bunch of time getting ready in the morning. This makes getting ready quick and easy. The product I ordered last looks different than the product I ordered a couple of months ago. In addition, the titanium dioxide percentage is lower in my newest bottle.
customer_reviews.author: lmorgan

customer_reviews.title: Best BB Cream I’ve used, has been my go to for years!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to BB cream for years. It never breaks out my sensitive, oily skin. It is perfect for days that I don’t want to/don’t have time to wear and put on foundation but still would like some kind of makeup. This BB cream is amazing, it is perfect for days that I work when I don’t want anything heavy and simply have no time to go through the routine of putting on foundation. It has great coverage for a BB cream and a little goes a long way. I personally wouldn’t buy any other one out there, for the price and quality it is perfect and highly recommended this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this unfortunately it’s very greasy yet emphasizes flakes, broke me out in acne, and I got a sunburn while wearing this and I haven’t had a sunburn in over five years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eres

customer_reviews.title: It’s one bottle!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It says that this should be a pack of two I only received 1. I think this is false advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasn't expecting much, but I have to say this product is great. The coverage is enough to where I don't have to wear powder and the color was perfect on my fair skin. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ehrenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smooth and not oily or greasy! I've had many compliments on my "skin" while wearing this. Totally will buy again! Good cheap price on a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy face
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and I’m not sure why I haven’t tried this sooner. I do try to use another moisturizer underneath but if I forget it’s perfectly fine. It give me a hint of color along with moisture without having to put on a full face of makeup. Perfect for the summer or when you want something quick.
customer_reviews.author: Zavi's Mami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home, don’t take it on the plane.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product, love the overall appearance and it can be the only face cream you apply. The price is good and the color is as advertised, I often wear it without a face cream over it. But don’t travel with it, the top is not secure enough to withstand airplane pressure and you’ll find it all over your other products.
customer_reviews.author: Rita A. Coombs

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish. It is quite a light cream but not too liquidity. It doesn’t cover break outs well but it does look natural. So I just apply a bit of concealer over blemishes. I’m a little bit concerned that it is causing me to break out but my skin has a mind of its own. So who knows. It definitely covers redness.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I really love maybelline BB cream. I apply a small amount of my regular moisturizer when I get out of the shower. Once absorbed I apply this BB cream (about the size of a dime) with fingertips. When you first put it on it looks like foundation but once it absorbs, you can't really tell you're wearing "makeup". I can't stand liquid foundation, and this stuff is great because it feels like a moisturizer. I apply my bare minerals powder over it once its nice and dry and that's all I put on my face. A great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily
customer_reviews.text: Gives light color/coverage to even out skin tone. Not greasy and blends in well. I use it fairly sparingly and so far I am happy with the SPF.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Got this for the girlfriend and she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The girlfriend has been looking for something like this for sometime now and after finding this I was surprised! Most things that do so much are usually hard on sensitive skin but this leaves her face looking and feeling nice and smooth! Good color, moisturizing really works, as to the SPF I cannot contest too but she hasn't gotton a sun burn on her face yet so that's probably a good sign! Will definitely be purchasing more for a good Christmas presents to all the ladies in my life! Plus it's a perfect little handheld size just right for on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Aaron Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great staple for year round
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal! I’ve used this on and off for years. I tend to use it more in the summer when I am going for a more natural look but want the SPF and some skin color coverage. The coverage on this is very minimal so be aware of that. Recently, I’ve been mixing this with a heavier foundation that is darker. It’s been perfect for mixing shades! Love
customer_reviews.author: Shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Classic and Best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the more expensive BB creams/cushions from Ulta and Sephora and even the OTC ones but nothing feels as good as this one, especially for the price. A little bit adds radiance and the right amount of sheen to achieve that no-makeup look. I have time and again returned back to this for my everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: chinar

customer_reviews.title: Favorite light coverage to get me out the door in a hurry
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that could function as a light daytime moisturizer and foundation, it was really important to me that it contain some level of sun protection as I spend a good deal of my day supervising children outdoors. This provides perfect light coverage and moisturizer and saves me time from having to apply separate products for these needs.
customer_reviews.author: KMGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: *Smoothes out skin imperfections pretty well *Little to no coverage..bt m okay with that.. Edit: i have been using it for a while now..it didn't give me any breakout. I just wet my skin in rain today while wearing the cream and it didn't come off or look patchy at all..very smooth product! Will buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about this product for me. It definitely does not protect against sun but i didn’t expect it too. It looks like all the other tinted moisturizers I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: My new Fav
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream is great I love ho it goes on smooth and you don't have to take a long time to blend it out. For a BB cream the coverage is great and it matches true to skin. I does not feel like you have any product on, so that is great. I am looking forward to continued use of this product.
customer_reviews.author: khalia Spencer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove this stuff. It’s incredible. I have fairly uneven skin tone and dark sunspots, and this does really good job of covering that and making my skin look amazing, while not being thick and cakey like foundation. It seriously makes your skin look incredible. Dewy, fresh, and smooth. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Best price, better than some name brands!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered it after saw the reviews. ( I have very sensitive skin, or should say problematic skin—super sensitive to sunshine) I gotta say “ it works!” It protect my skin from sunburn. The First time I used it on my sunburned skin , no tickling, no burning but soothing.
customer_reviews.author: notnew

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...no orange cast.
customer_reviews.text: Minimal coverage but enough to blur the imperfections and go! Just what I was looking for. I was so tired of waiting for my sunscreen to absorb then wait and go back to apply markup. Most tinted sunscreen start out orange on me or oxidize during the day; this one did not. Pleasantly suprised.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: Maybelline Dream Fresh BB Cream Makeup, Medium, 1 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Color:120 MEDIUMHave a good skin day, everyday! Unveil flawless skin with Maybelline New York’s skin perfector Dream Fresh BB Cream for a healthy skin glow. Our BB (which stands for “Beauty Balm”) cream combines skincare and makeup to perfect skin in 1 simple step and provides sheer coverage with the added benefit of SPF to protect you from the harsh rays of the sun. Blurs imperfections. Brightens. Enhances. Hydrates. Evens skin tone. Smooths. Zero oils and heavy ingredients. Protects with SPF 30. The 8-in-1 skin perfector’s replenishing water-gel formula leaves the skin feeling fresh with a dewy finish. Suitable for all skin type, the Dream Fresh BB Cream’ sheer coverage suits a wide range of skin tones. Available in 5 different shades ranging from light to deep skin tones.

BRAND STORY
By Maybelline
feature_bullets: DREAM FRESH BB CREAM: Daily 8-in-1 BB skin perfector brightens, smoothes, hydrates, & protects with broad-spectrum SPF 30. Gives skin a dewy finish.
LIGHT COVERAGE FOUNDATION + SKINCARE BENEFITS = BB CREAM: BB Cream adjusts to skin tone, minimizes & blurs the look of pores, & reduces the appearance of redness.

BEST FACE FORWARD: Maybelline has sheer, medium, & full coverage foundation in liquid, stick, & cushion foundation formulas, & a range of concealers, face primers, contour, highlighter, & pressed powders to help you create a perfect canvas.

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look—foundation, bb creams, concealers, & highlighters for the perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils, & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, & as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.

specifications.Manufacturer: Maybelline, Consumer Products Division of L’Oréal USA S/D, Inc.
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
